SEARCH
Module Assignment
Package utility

Class ViewUtility

java.lang.Object
utility.ViewUtility
public class ViewUtility extends Object
The ViewUtility class provides utility methods for displaying onto view menus. It also allows the screen to be cleared.

    • displayInMenuNumberedTwoColumns

      public static void displayInMenuNumberedTwoColumns(String s, int index, int colValue1, int colValue2)
      Displays a string as a numbered entry in the two column menu with numerical entry on the right column.
      Parameters:
      s - The string in the entry.
      index - The numbered index.
      colValue1 - The first integer value for the right column.
      colValue2 - The second integer value for the right column.
